reviewText: enjoyed it and am thrilled to add it to my collection

Excellent video!
This is a great way to learn about the first big battle of the War.  I liked how some of the action is B&W and it reminded of early footage shot during WW1.  It had that grainy, early film, feel to it!
The Wide Awake Films folks do a great job with these videos and I recommend this one!
I learned much about the Battle of Bull Run that I didn't already know.  What a great documentary.  If you are a Civil War historian...you better at this to your collection.
